project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV Files
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, specifically calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement mean calculation for numerical columns
Implement median calculation for numerical columns
Implement mode calculation for numerical columns
Write tests for the mean, median, and mode functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
